buyer_research:
{
  "name": "Shell",
  "website": "https://www.shell.com/",
  "description": "Shell is a global group of energy and petrochemical companies, employing 103,000 people and with operations in more than 70 countries.",
  "industry": "Energy and Petrochemical",
  "company_size": 103000,
  "goals": [
    "Become a net-zero emissions energy business by 2050 or sooner",
    "Cut carbon footprint by 50% by 2025",
    "Reduce the net carbon footprint of its energy products by around 20 percent by 2035"
  ],
  "use_cases": [
    "Exploration, production, refining and marketing of oil and natural gas",
    "Production and import of fuels, chemicals, and lubricants",
    "Operation of service stations"
  ],
  "challenges": [
    "Fluctuating prices of crude oil, natural gas, oil products and chemicals",
    "Disconnect between climate change goals and traditional business of producing and selling fossil fuels",
    "Risk of being seen as greenwashing"
  ],
  "stakeholders": [
    "Shareholders",
    "Customers",
    "Employees",
    "Environment"
  ]
}
anticipated_qopcs:
{
  "pains": [
    "How does Whatfix's digital adoption platform support our goal of reducing carbon footprint and becoming a net-zero emissions energy business by 2050?",
    "Will Whatfix's solution be able to handle the complexity of our energy and petrochemical operations?",
    "How can Whatfix help us improve our employee onboarding process, given the size of our company?",
    "What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing Whatfix's solution, and how will it impact our bottom line?",
    "How does Whatfix's pricing model accommodate our company's size and global operations?",
    "How can Whatfix help us reduce the risk of being seen as greenwashing, and improve our environmental reputation?",
    "How does Whatfix integrate with our existing software applications, and what kind of support does it offer for implementation?",
    "What kind of analytics and reporting does Whatfix provide, and how can we use it to measure the success of our digital adoption efforts?"
  ],
  "objections": [
    "We're not sure if Whatfix's solution is scalable enough for our company's size and global operations.",
    "We've had bad experiences with digital adoption platforms in the past, how is Whatfix different?",
    "We're not convinced that Whatfix's solution will provide a significant ROI for our company.",
    "We're concerned about the security and data privacy of Whatfix's solution, given the sensitive nature of our operations.",
    "We're not sure if Whatfix's solution is flexible enough to accommodate our unique business needs and requirements.",
    "We're comparing Whatfix with other digital adoption platforms like WalkMe, Pendo, and Userpilot, and we're not sure if Whatfix is the best fit for us."
  ]
}
